record.text: I booked a room online with wheretosleep.com at the Silton Hotel and they never got the reservation. We need a King bed and then they didn't have one when we checked in. When I called wheretosleep.com back they said they had a guaranteed King room and paid for it. We had to go to another hotel that could accomodate us. Since they promised WhereToSleep.com a King room for us, we should not have to pay them.
